daily_analysis.reasoning: Broad chart (30+ candles) shows clear higher highs and higher lows from ~2,600-2,700 up to ~4,100 (uptrend). Recent daily candle (H 4,117.42 / L 3,998.15) engulfs the prior red candle shadows = bullish engulfing occurring at a short-term support area ~3,998–4,117, so the valid signal in an uptrend is a buy.

m30_analysis.reasoning: Using the strict SOP definition (engulfing must cover previous candle body + wicks), I could not confidently identify any M30 bullish engulfing pattern in the provided chart image that clearly and completely engulfs the prior candle and overlaps the Daily zone 3998.15–4117.42. Chart resolution and overlap of many candles/wicks make strict confirmation uncertain, so no valid engulfing pair was reported.

errors: M30 pattern not inside Daily zone
